results.name: Denominator triangle for hydrogen spectrum rationals.
comment: The corresponding numerator triangle is A120072.
See A120072 and A120070 for more details.
link: W. Lang: First ten rows, rationals and more.
mathematica: Table[ Table[1/n^2 - 1/m^2 // Denominator, {n, 1, m-1}], {m, 2, 10}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Sep 16 2013 *)
